com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework

Interface ListenerApp


  • public interface ListenerApp

    This interface allows to define callback functions which must be directly used within the code through TransferManager and AutoTransferManager classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnection(AdHocDevice adHocDevice)
      Method allowing to notify when a connection is performed with a remote peer.
      void onConnectionClosed(AdHocDevice adHocDevice)
      Method allowing to notify when a connection is closed with a remote peer.
      void onConnectionClosedFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during closing a connection.
      void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during connection process.
      void onForwardData(AdHocDevice adHocDevice, java.lang.Object pdu)
      Method allowing to notify when a Data message from remote peer is forwarded.
      void onReceivedData(AdHocDevice adHocDevice, java.lang.Object pdu)
      Method allowing to notify when a Data message is received from a remote peer.
      void processMsgException(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during processing messages.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceivedData

        void onReceivedData(AdHocDevice adHocDevice,
                    java.lang.Object pdu)
        Method allowing to notify when a Data message is received from a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        adHocDevice - an AdHocDevice object which represents the remote peer that has sent the message.
        pdu - a generic object which represents the pdu of the message.

      • onForwardData

        void onForwardData(AdHocDevice adHocDevice,
                   java.lang.Object pdu)
        Method allowing to notify when a Data message from remote peer is forwarded.
        Parameters:
        adHocDevice - an AdHocDevice object which represents the remote peer that has sent the message.
        pdu - a generic object which represents the pdu of the message.

      • onConnection

        void onConnection(AdHocDevice adHocDevice)
        Method allowing to notify when a connection is performed with a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        adHocDevice - an AdHocDevice object which represents the remote peer with which the connection is established.

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during connection process. A IOException, DeviceException are exception that are thrown by the underlying layer.
        Parameters:
        e - an Exception object (IOException and DeviceException caused by the underlying layer.

      • onConnectionClosed

        void onConnectionClosed(AdHocDevice adHocDevice)
        Method allowing to notify when a connection is closed with a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        adHocDevice - an AdHocDevice object which represents the remote peer with which the connection is broken.

      • onConnectionClosedFailed

        void onConnectionClosedFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during closing a connection. A IOException, DeviceException are exception that are thrown by the underlying layer.
        Parameters:
        e - an Exception object (IOException and DeviceException caused by the underlying layer.

      • processMsgException

        void processMsgException(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method allowing to notify when a exception occurs during processing messages. A IOException, NotSerializableException are exception that are thrown by the underlying layer.
        Parameters:
        e - an Exception object (IOException and NotSerializableException) caused by the underlying layer.
